Name: Plat4mer
About the game: 'climb. kill. survive.' Plat4mer is a simple 2D action platformer. The game is played in short rounds, where the goal is to accumulate as many points as possible. Points are earned by killing enemies. Your character has multiple combat and utility skills - use these to kill as many enemies as possible! Art by the amazing Casey Fallon!
